::Hot Rod::

He laughs at Angel Prime's comment.
"Their probably off doing the..." 
He notices that Angel Prime is running out of the base, and shuts his
mouth.

::Demolition::

He gets out of the CR chamber, and opens a comm to Zardus.
"Hey boss, anything you need me to?"
